title: More Insanity in the State Vote Counts Emerge (Ep 1397)
description:
In this episode, I discuss the latest troubling revelations to emerge from the 2020 election out of Michigan, Georgia, and Wisconsin. I also address Arlo. If you haven’t heard of Arlo, you should listen. 

News Picks:

In a dramatic reversal, Wayne County election board members rescind their votes to certify the county vote tally.


The threats and intimidation tactics directed at these Michigan republicans is frightening.

What the heck is going on with the Georgia vote count? 


More on that suspicious statement about the security of the 2020 election. 


Prominent liberal lawyer says Trump can prevail in court. 


Debunking tax and spending myths. 

Are the risks of opening schools being exaggerated?


Yes, Moderna was part of Operation Warp Speed.

I told you the Dems would use my Facebook page as an exhibit in their anti-free speech campaign.


Copyright Bongino Inc All Rights Reserved.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
